\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{How To Register For Online Access}
\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Go to the \sphinxhref{https://www.transferonline.com/}{Transfer Online, Inc.} website.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Click \sphinxtitleref{Get Started Today}.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.25]{{get_started_today}.png}
\caption{Get Started Today}\label{\detokenize{index:id2}}\end{figure}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Click \sphinxtitleref{Sign Up Here}.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.25]{{sign_up_here_shareholders}.png}
\caption{Sign Up Here}\label{\detokenize{index:id4}}\end{figure}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Fill out the required information.
\begin{quote}

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.25]{{register_for_online_access_page}.png}
\caption{Register Online Access Page}\label{\detokenize{index:id6}}\end{figure}
\end{quote}

\clearpage

\end{enumerate}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:step-5}}\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\setcounter{enumi}{4}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Verify Account.

\begin{sphinxadmonition}{note}{Note:}
\sphinxAtStartPar
There are various options to verify your account.
\end{sphinxadmonition}

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.1. (Optional) Method One: Use a Security Code.

\sphinxAtStartPar
There are a few ways to find the Security Code:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
From a Proxy Voting Card,

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
A letter sent from the Issuing Company,

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
A letter sent from Transfer Online, Or

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
From another member who is already managing the account you wish to manage.

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.1.1. (To Skip) Click \sphinxtitleref{I don’t have a Security Code}.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.25]{{skip_security_code}.png}
\caption{Skip Security Code Option}\label{\detokenize{index:id8}}\end{figure}

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.1.2. Input Security Code into \sphinxtitleref{Security Code} field.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.25]{{security_code_field}.png}
\caption{Security Code field}\label{\detokenize{index:id10}}\end{figure}

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.1.3. Click \sphinxtitleref{Next}.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.35]{{security_code_next_button}.png}
\caption{Security Code, Next Button}\label{\detokenize{index:id12}}\end{figure}

\clearpage

\end{itemize}

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.2. (Optional) Method Two: Use Information From Certificate.

\sphinxAtStartPar
This method works if you have a \sphinxstylestrong{Physical Certificate} with the following information:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Certificate Name,

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Certificate Number, And

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
(If known) Certificate ID.

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.2.1.   \sphinxstylestrong{(To Skip)} Click \sphinxtitleref{Skip This Step}.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.25]{{skip_certificate_information}.png}
\caption{Skip Certificate Information}\label{\detokenize{index:id14}}\end{figure}

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.2.2.   Fill out the required information.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.25]{{certificate_information_fields}.png}
\caption{Certificate Information}\label{\detokenize{index:id16}}\end{figure}

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.2.3.   Click \sphinxtitleref{Next}.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.25]{{certificate_information_next_button}.png}
\caption{Certificate Information, Next Button}\label{\detokenize{index:id18}}\end{figure}

\clearpage

\end{itemize}

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.3. (Optional) Method Three: Provide as Much Information as Possible.

\sphinxAtStartPar
Use this method if you lack both:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
A Security Code, And

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Certificate Information.

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.3.1.   Fill out the required information.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.25]{{general_account_option_fields}.png}
\caption{Provide Account Information Fields}\label{\detokenize{index:id20}}\end{figure}

\sphinxAtStartPar
5.3.2.   Click \sphinxtitleref{Submit}.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.25]{{general_account_option_submit}.png}
\caption{Provide Account Information, Submit Button}\label{\detokenize{index:id22}}\end{figure}

\end{itemize}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
(Optional) Add an Additional Shareholder

\sphinxAtStartPar
You can add an additional shareholder to the account from the “Link Request Pending” page.

\sphinxAtStartPar
6.1 Click \sphinxtitleref{Add/Remove Accounts} at the top of the page.

\sphinxAtStartPar
6.2 Click \sphinxtitleref{Add an Account}.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.5]{{add_an_account_button}.png}
\caption{Add an Account Button}\label{\detokenize{index:id26}}\end{figure}

\sphinxAtStartPar
6.3 Repeat \sphinxtitleref{Step 5 \textless{}step\_5\textgreater{}} for the additional shareholder.

\sphinxAtStartPar
6.4 Click \sphinxtitleref{Add/Remove Accounts} at the top of the page to confirm shareholder was added.

\begin{figure}[htbp]
\centering
\capstart

\noindent\sphinxincludegraphics[scale=0.5]{{new_account_status}.png}
\caption{Add/Remove Accounts Button}\label{\detokenize{index:id28}}\end{figure}

\end{enumerate}
